scripts.ahmad_khoja: cd ahmad_khoja && concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad:client,ahmad:server "http-server -p 3020 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.install:ahmad_khoja: cd ahmad_khoja && cd front && pnpm install && cd ../back && pnpm install
scripts.ali_osseily: cd ali_osseily && concurrently --kill-others -n ali:client,ali:server "http-server -p 3030 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.install:ali_osseily: cd ali_osseily && cd front && pnpm install && cd ../back && pnpm install
scripts.amr_gharz: cd amr_gharz && concurrently --kill-others -n amr:client,amr:server "http-server -p 3040 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node index.js"
scripts.install:amr_gharz: cd amr_gharz && cd front && pnpm install && cd ../back && pnpm install
scripts.bayan_mawed: cd bayan_mawed && concurrently --kill-others -n bayan:client,bayan:server "http-server -p 3070 ./client/build" "cd ./back && node index.js"
scripts.install:bayan_mawed: cd bayan_mawed && cd client && pnpm install && cd ../back && pnpm install
scripts.fadi_moubassaleh: cd fadi_moubassaleh_build/bundle && concurrently --kill-others -n fadi:meteor "cross-env PORT=3090 ROOT_URL=http://localhost:3090 node main.js"
scripts.fadi_moubassaleh:meteor: cd fadi_moubassaleh && concurrently --kill-others -n fadi:meteor "cross-env PORT=3090 meteor"
scripts.build:fadi_moubassaleh: cd fadi_moubassaleh && pnpm install --production && meteor build --debug --directory ../fadi_moubassaleh_build && cd ../fadi_moubassaleh_build/bundle/programs/server && pnpm install
scripts.jad_azar: cd jad_azar && concurrently --kill-others -n jad:razzle "cross-env PORT=4010 NODE_ENV=production node ./build/server.js"
scripts.build:jad_azar: cd jad_azar && cross-env PORT=4010 pnpm run build
scripts.nagham_ramadan: cd nagham_ramadan && concurrently --kill-others -n nagham:client,nagham:server "http-server -p 4030 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.install:nagham_ramadan: cd nagham_ramadan && cd front && pnpm install && cd ../back && pnpm install
scripts.saleh_saadi: cd saleh_saadi && concurrently --kill-others -n saleh:client,saleh:server "http-server -p 4050 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.install:saleh_saadi: cd saleh_saadi && cd front && pnpm install && cd ../back  && pnpm install
scripts.install:all: pnpm run install:ahmad_khoja && pnpm run install:ali_osseily && pnpm run install:amr_gharz && pnpm run install:anas_jamous && pnpm run install:anthony_nakhle && pnpm run install:bayan_mawed && pnpm run install:fadi_moubassaleh && pnpm run install:hampig_mazakian && pnpm run install:ibrahim_jakmour && pnpm run install:jad_azar && pnpm run install:mitza_haddad && pnpm run install:nagham_ramadan && pnpm run install:saleh_saadi && pnpm run install:souad_ali
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:ahmad_khoja && pnpm run build:ali_osseily && pnpm run build:amr_gharz && pnpm run build:anas_jamous && pnpm run build:anthony_nakhle && pnpm run build:bayan_mawed && pnpm run build:fadi_moubassaleh && pnpm run build:hampig_mazakian && pnpm run build:jad_azar && pnpm run build:mitza_haddad && pnpm run build:nagham_ramadan && pnpm run build:saleh_saadi && pnpm run build:souad_ali
scripts.git:update: git submodule update --recursive --remote && pnpm run install:all
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others -n main,ahmad,ali,amr,anas,anthony,bayan,hampig,jad,mitza,nagham,paul,saleh,souad "pnpm run requirements" "pnpm run ahmad_khoja" "pnpm run ali_osseily" "pnpm run amr_gharz" "pnpm run anas_jamous" "pnpm run anthony_nakhle" "pnpm run bayan_mawed" 	"pnpm run hampig_mazakian" "pnpm run jad_azar" "pnpm run nagham_ramadan" "pnpm run paul_kananjian" "pnpm run saleh_saadi" "pnpm run souad_ali"
scripts.ttart: concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad,ali,amr,anas,anthony,bayan,fadi,hampig,ibrahim,jad,mitza,nagham.paul,saleh,souad "pnpm run ahmad_khoja" "pnpm run ali_osseily" "pnpm run amr_gharz" "pnpm run anas_jamous" "pnpm run anthony_nakhle" "pnpm run bayan_mawed" "pnpm run fadi_moubassaleh" "pnpm run hampig_mazakian" "pnpm run ibrahim_jakmour" "pnpm run jad_azar" "pnpm run nagham_ramadan" "pnpm run paul_kananjian" "pnpm run saleh_saadi" "pnpm run souad_ali"
scripts.ftart: concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad,ali,amr,anas,anthony,bayan,hampig,ibrahim,jad,mitza,nagham,paul,saleh,souad "pnpm run ahmad_khoja" "pnpm run ali_osseily" "pnpm run amr_gharz" "pnpm run anas_jamous" "pnpm run anthony_nakhle" "pnpm run bayan_mawed" "pnpm run hampig_mazakian" "pnpm run ibrahim_jakmour" "pnpm run jad_azar" "pnpm run nagham_ramadan" "pnpm run paul_kananjian" "pnpm run saleh_saadi" "pnpm run souad_ali"
